item.title: Papal conclave live updates: Black smoke on second round of voting, no pope elected
item.description: Catholic cardinals are gathering at the Vatican to elect the successor to Pope Francis, who died on April 21.

item.title: India says it intercepted 'drones and missiles' fired by Pakistan

item.title: Actor Michael Pitt arrested on sexual abuse charges
item.description: "Boardwalk Empire" star Michael Pitt was arrested on sexual abuse charges on Friday, May 2.

item.title: Sen. John Fetterman raises alarms with outburst at meeting with union, sources say
item.description: Pennsylvania Sen. John Fetterman was meeting recently with representatives from a teachers union when things quickly devolved

item.title: WATCH: St. Peter's Square packed with people as first smoke billows from Sistine Chapel
item.description: David Muir reports on some of the moving images from Day 1 of the historic conclave to elect a new pope.
